actions.recommendation: Abdominal ultrasound is recommended if liver enzymes remain elevated.
Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
Postnasal drip: Stay hydrated, use a humidifier in your room at night and saline nasal spray for the day. Avoid irritants such as sugar, dairy and spicy foods.

Abdominal circumference is not limited to fat under the skin but also fat around the organs of your abdomen, linked with Type 2 diabetes, high BP& breathing problems. Eat whole unprocessed foods, get good sleep,manage stress.
